mapper.select: SELECT user_name AS userId, os_type AS sourceType FROM tbl_login_track WHERE TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(login_time) <= 1 AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(login_time) > 0 group by user_name,os_type
SELECT user_name AS userId, os_type AS sourceType FROM tbl_login_track login_time <= #{endTime} login_time >= #{startTime} group by user_name,os_type

select DISTINCT(user_name) as userId,os_type as osType from tbl_login_track where
login_time >= date_sub(DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S'), interval #{intervalTime} minute)
and
login_time <= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
group by os_type
